paper_metadata.title: Information and Communications Technology for Poverty Reduction in Rural India

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: ICT can reduce poverty by improving poor people's access to education, health, government and financial services
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: as shown by the preceding cases

evidence_citations.country_citation: in rural India -as well as in much of the developing world
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: ICT projects implemented by graasroots-based organizations and individuals who have the appropriate incentives to work with marginalized groups
